results.description: Ross Paterson's rink will represent Scotland at the European Curling Championships as reigning champions Team Mouat lose in a play-off.
results.title: European Curling Championships: Team Paterson wins Scottish play-off as champions Team Mouat bow out

results.description: The 30-year-old admits his part in a break-in at Dumfries Museum more than five years ago.
results.title: Man jailed over Rhona Martin Olympic medal theft

results.description: Reigning champion Bruce Mouat must win a play-off to represent Scotland at the European Championships, but Eve Muirhead is selected.
results.title: European Curling Championships: Reigning champion Bruce Mouat faces play-off

results.description: Eve Muirhead's rink will be completed by Vicky Wright next season after she stepped up from her role as alternate.
results.shortTitle: Wright new member of Team Muirhead
results.title: Vicky Wright new fourth member of Eve Muirhead's rink

results.description: Former world curling champion Vicki Chalmers has retired from Scotland duty.
results.title: Curling: Vicki Chalmers retires from Scotland duty

results.description: Scotland's Eve Muirhead admits it will be "strange" playing for Swedish rival Team Hasselborg as she subs for their Olympic champion skip at a Canadian grand slam.
results.shortTitle: 'Big shoes to fill' - Muirhead steps in for Olympic champion
results.title: Curling: Eve Muirhead has 'big shoes to fill' subbing for rival Swedish skip

results.description: Scotland are out of the World Men's Curling Championships after a 6-5 loss to Canada in a play-off.
results.shortTitle: Scotland out of World Curling Champs
results.title: Scotland out of World Curling Championships after play-off defeat

results.description: Scotland claim the final play-off spot at the World Men's Curling Championship and will face Canada for a semi-final berth.
results.title: Curling: Scotland through to face Canada for semi-final place

results.description: Scotland improve their chances of reaching the play-offs at the World Men's Curling Championship with wins over China and Canada.
results.shortTitle: Scots rally to beat China and Canada
results.title: Curling: Scotland beat China & Canada at World Men's Championship

results.description: Japan take on Switzerland in the bronze medal match at the World Men's Curling Championships from Lethbridge in Canada.
results.shortTitle: Watch: Men's Curling Championships from Canada
results.title: World Men's Curling Championships from Lethbridge in Canada - Bronze medal game

results.description: Scotland have three wins from six at the World Men's Curling Championship after beating South Korea.
results.shortTitle: Two wins for Scots at World Championship
results.title: Curling: Scotland beat Sweden and South Korea at World Men's Championship

results.description: Olympic curling medallist Tom Brewster does not think Bruce Mouat's Scots will be "panicking yet" despite a rocky start to the World Championship.
results.title: World Men's Curling Championship: 'Don't panic', Scottish curlers urged

results.description: Scotland beat Russia in their opening match at the World Men's Curling Championship in Canada.
results.shortTitle: Scots beat Russia at World Curling Championship
results.title: Scotland beat Russia 8-2 in World Men's Curling Championship opener

thumbnail.altText: Scotland skip Bruce Mouat watches a stone

results.description: Bruce Mouat skips for Scotland against opponents USA in the World Men's Curling Championship from Canada.
results.shortTitle: Watch: Men's World Curling - USA v Scotland
results.title: World Men's Curling Championships from Canada - Watch USA v Scotland

results.description: Scottish curler Eve Muirhead says she has to be "better than before" to realise her dream of making it on to another Olympic podium.
results.shortTitle: 'I'll do all it takes to be best again'
results.title: Curling: Eve Muirhead targets another Olympic medal on road to recovery

results.description: Watch live coverage of the Women's World Curling bronze medal game from Denmark.
results.title: Watch: World Curling bronze game Japan v Korea

results.description: Scotland cannot reach the play-offs at the Women's World Curling Championship after a seventh defeat in 11 round-robin matches.
results.shortTitle: Scotland fail to reach World play-offs
results.title: Women's World Curling Championship: Scotland fail to reach play-offs

results.description: Watch live coverage of Scotland's round robin against USA in the Women's World Curling Championship in Denmark.
results.title: Watch: Women's World Curling finals

results.description: Scotland's hopes of reaching the play-offs at the Women's World Curling Championships are in the balance after two defeats on Wednesday.
results.title: Women's World Curling Championship: Double defeat dents Scotland's hopes

results.description: Scotland skip Sophie Jackson seals a dramatic 6-5 victory over defending champions Canada at the World Championships in Denmark.
results.shortTitle: Scots beat Canada in World Championships
results.title: Women's World Curling Championship: Scotland beat holders Canada for fourth win

thumbnail.altText: Scotland in action at the World Championships in Denmark.
